thread.title: 15 Awesome Games to Play at Your Holiday Gatherings
thread.title_full: 15 Awesome Games to Play at Your Holiday Gatherings

title: 15 Awesome Games to Play at Your Holiday Gatherings
text:
15 Awesome Games to Play at Your Holiday Gatherings Written by: Caroline Nolan 10/17/15 - 9:07 AM EDT 
NEW YORK (MainStreet) -- As the holidays approach, many families are already exhausted from preparing everything from travel itineraries to grocery lists. 
But even after all of the major details are sorted out, there may be periods of time when the host has nothing planned for the rest of the family. Instead of heading out to a movie, this time should be spent enjoying everyoneâ€™s company, especially when family members cannot see each other often. 
There are countless games for families to play that lead to great conversations and fun memories beyond typical choices like charades or Pictionary . Some of these games are new twists on old favorites, while others are unique ideas that will keep multiple generations of family members excited and interested for hours. More Headlines
